resources.string: ARmsk Demo is an application developed to demonstrate the ARmsk API.

How to add a good marker: 
* First you need a a good 2D symbol/picture or pattern. 
* The more features there are in the picture the better the marker. Many edges and high contrast result in larger amounts features. 
* Aim at the pattern from straight above and press the menu-button and then on Add Marker. 

How to start Augmented Reality: 
* Aim at your marker, press the menu-button and then on Start AR.
First you need to load a image marker for the application to use. You can choose to take a picture with the camera or load a image from the sdcard.
First you need to load a image marker for the application to use. You can choose to take a picture with the camera or load a image from the sdcard.
